title: Record $14.5B Bitcoin Heist from LuBian Pool Exposed After 5 Years
description: In December 2020, hackers stole 127,426 Bitcoin—worth $3.5 billion then, $14.5 billion now—from China's LuBian mining pool via a weak private key, remaining undetected for five years until Arkham's 2025 revelation. This record heist exposes crypto's vulnerabilities, urging enhanced security and regulatory reforms.
